Package com.soa.process.validation

Interface Summary
ActivityValidator An interface for performing activity specific validation.
ValidationContext Provides context to an ActivityValidator, such as the activity definition to validate and access to a validation report in which errors and warnings can be stated.
 

Class Summary
ValidationReport Holds the results of a validation attempt.
ValidationReportEntry Individual message of a validation report.
 

Enum Summary
ValidationReport.Status  
ValidationReportEntry.Level
